author: Darren Lazarus
title: WSJ City PM: Bank of England Holds Fire for Now, Economists Predict a 2020 Recession, Why RBS Is Investible Again - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Good afternoon from the WSJ City desks in London. WSJ City is the app that delivers concise, smart news on business and finance for mobile. Download for iPhone or Android.
